content: special edition basic sunflower pillow pattern ***this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/basicsunflowerpillowpattern this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy last year i made the autumn sunflower pillow and blanket patterns this year i m bringing you the special edition of those who doesn t love a super chunky project that works up really quick this one also happens to be beginner friendly it s really basic and straight forward with a squishy light hearted design it s the perfect project to ease you into autumn… this pattern is written for pillow size 18x18 square in super chunky weight yarn i used lion brand wool ease thick & quick with a 9 00mm hook any super chunky weight yarn will work as long as gauge is met pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - gauge - alternative yarn suggestions and links - stitch glossary - printable pdf - schematic for pillow - written instructions for sunflower granny square - video tutorial for the sunflower granny square used the never-ending granny square and seaming for the pillow panel happy crocheting everyone l m
